name: Chords
description:
Built for the 2018 Music Game Jam.

EXTREMELY UNFINISHED AND HIGHLY EXPERIMENTAL

This game is designed to be simple and easy to play.  Navigate your way through increasingly difficult platforms in order to collect notes and build up a chord. The game is built in an isometric angle, with extremely simple graphics.

CONTROLS:

 Use the arrow keys or WASD to move around. Escape is to quit.
